Help:Node.title: Command Usage: address
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: StoryGuide Commands
!addnote [user] "[message]" - Adds a record to a user's notes.
!assist [option] - Allows access to the assist system.
!badname "[name]" - Adds a name to the badname list.
!badnames - Lists everything on the badname list.
!broadcast "[message]" - Sends a message to everyone.
!busy [on off] - Disallows or allows pages.
!customers - Lists non-staff members in a game, alphabetically.
!disconnect [character] - Forcibly logs the character off.
!dismiss [character] "[reason]" - Sends someone to the OOC jail.
!drag [character] - Lets you carry a character off.
!finger [character] - Provides character's account information.
!goodname "[name]" - Removes a name from the badname list.
!grab [character] - Teleports a character to you.
!hotspots - Lists most populous locales.
!infoline [on off] - Determines if you see login and logoff info.
!join [character] - Teleports you to a character.
!killnote [user] - Removes most recent record from user's notes.
!mute [character] "[reason]" - Shuts someone up, temporarily.
!notes [user] - Lists all the records in a user's notes.
!office - Teleports you to the Skotos office.
!page [character] "[message]" - Sends a message to character.
!people - Lists everyone in the game, by location.
!rename [old name] [new name] - rename a character.
!suspend [options] - Changes account suspension status.
!see [options] - See when specific people log in/out.
!swap - Changes between StoryGuide and normal character.
!ungrab [character] - Teleports grabbed character back.
!unmute [character] - Lets someone talk again after muting.
!whereis [character] - Displays character's location.
